job_title: SMTS/LMTS Full Stack, Software Developer, BE Leaning (Service Cloud)
job_description:
• Build scalable, reliable, maintainable, high-performing web applications using Java-based technologies for the backend and modern JavaScript frameworks for the frontend that meet business requirements.
• Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to define project requirements and deliverables.

• Proven hands-on development experience with Java, Spring Boot, and a passion for developing and delivering high-quality code.
• Experience with Spring, gRPC, REST, and the HTTP protocol.
• Experience with Agile development methodology.
• Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively across teams.
• Experience in developing and maintaining high-availability systems.

• Experience building statistical models.
• Strong interpersonal and executive presentation skills for effective partnership and long-range planning.

• A collaborative spirit and excellent interpersonal skills.
• A related technical degree required.
